card.name: Royal Determination
card.description: {{KW:BURN}} your dustpile. For every 7 monsters burned, summon the next {{TRIBE:LOST_SOUL|1}} with {{STATS:+1|+1}}, {{KW:HASTE}} and {{KW:TAUNT}}.
